page1: ^Puttin’ the word out to any other law in the area: there’s some new wildlife in the valley, look like monsters. STEER CLEAR OF ‘EM. They’re rooted into the ground like trees, got one big yellow eye-lookin’ thing and arms like tree branches curvin’ up around it.

^Again, if you see ‘em, let ‘em be. If you get too close, you’ll wish you’d been shot by a gun if you’re still alive to do any wishin’. These things mostly keep to themselves, seein’ as they can’t move on their own.
^If you ABSOLUTELY NEED to kill one, pulling ‘em out of the ground should work. Take a lotta force to do the job, though, and it probably won’t be quick.
^But I say again, one last time: if you stick your nose too close into these things, it won’t be them that do you in.
